data.text: @keeweedoc @DocPNW You’ve moved to Nelson to work or the whole fam has moved? I remember someone getting a medevac from Te anal when I was there. Remote NZ huh? Sending fortitude to you all.

@keeweedoc @DocPNW Oh Andre, sounds challenging. You’re geographically isolated there aren’t you. Or you seem it to me, I’m sure it feels different when it’s your home. If someone gets really sick do they have to go to Christchurch?

@HumanTourniquet @DocPNW In short it's been a rapid ramp up and despite having plenty of time its being held together by mostly good luck and the fairly being course of our patients being 95% vax and 50% boosted. Also plenty of funding challenges. MONDAY HERE WE GO!!

@HumanTourniquet @DocPNW They promised updates but we will see. The move from PCR to RAT testing has been messy. We had a few private purchased for our clinic but otherwise would have ran out. Alot of patients dont understand the need for repeat testing and are falsely reassured.

@HumanTourniquet @DocPNW I'll know much better today. Number shot up fast and the  national computer system they wanted us to use was the border control system that was used for the quarantine of arrivals. It is slow can take days for people to be created. Doesn't link with national lab system
@DocPNW @keeweedoc Are things bad there covid-wise Andre?
